title: Border, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Brussels style border with a serpentine floral pattern surrounding a seated figure, possibly Flora and Amphitrite riding a shell drawn by a dolphin and escorted by mermaids.
